content.prompt: Which of the following was a piece of evidence Hamilton used to support his argument in the excerpt?

choices.label: Earlier attempts to form associations of states in Europe had failed.
The United States had the authority to mandate funding under the Articles of Confederation.
Some people believed that the states would agree to follow the congressional directives.
States sometimes needed to form alliances to achieve shared goals.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
